title: BUG SPLAT after this recent patch?
body:
I updated the game today and am using the new client. 

Custom game worked just fine but when I try to play ARAM or any other PVP mode, the game closes and a BUG SPLAT error message appears. I will keep trying to see if it is a temporary issue or will have to repair client or even uninstall and download the game again but was wondering if anybody else was having any issues similar to this one or completely different with the new patch that came out.

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: You may have had a bad update that corrupted some game files, or even an out dated driver causing the game to fail rendering.  Go through the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up.  I know reinstalling can be a bit of a hassle, so use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to your advantage to automatically get that stuff take care of.   Let me know if you have any questions!

I've been having this same issue right after the last patch... i downloaded your hextech repair tool and yet it doesn't force a repatch... keeps saying: the syntax of the command is incorrect
and i don't wanna miss with the client files and try deleting stuff while not knowing what exactly should i be doing

If the above guide wasn't able to help, our tech team can take a closer look through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Attach the logs provided by the HRT into your ticket for some more context, and we'll take a look individually with you.  We'll reply back asap!
